data.text: Like [MET] a new shoot often grows from the stump of a tree,
The Spirit of Yahweh will always be with him.
He will be glad to obey Yahweh.
He will judge the cases of needy people fairly;
When he becomes king, wolves and lambs will live together peacefully;
Cows and bears will eat together;
Babies will play safely near the holes where cobra snakes live;
No creatures will harm or kill other creatures on Zion Hill, my holy hill;
At that time, a descendant of King David will hold up a flag
At that time, Yahweh will ◄reach out his hand/use his power► as he did long ago;
Yahweh will raise his flag among all the people-groups,
Then, the people of Israel and the people of Judah will not be jealous of each other any longer,
Their armies will join together to attack the people of Philistia to the west.
Yahweh will make a dry road through the sea near Egypt.
And because he will make a highway for his people who are living in Assyria,
